text:
The link is <https://oni.bio>
We have currently had to turn off the requested fields for First Name, Last Name and Message to prevent them from showing but the email error message is working fine. We would like to be able to have all required.
I run a system on my other CMS sites called <https://mysites.guru> for my WordPress and Joomla websites. Something like this would be a good option
Have turned on for just First Name for today so you can see the issue

So, if I was going to do this I would use some <spans> inside the H3 like '<h3><span class="black-background">real <span class="blue-text">crossmedia</span></span><span class="back-background">commerce</span></h3>`
and make your black background be display block
I think that is how I would go at it. not sure how proper it is
